general_advisory: In view of weather forecast by IMD, farmers are advised to withhold sowing operation for the time being and to resume the sowing soon after receding of rain by utilizing available soil moisture. In view of above forecast farmers advised to avoid the application of fertilizers and pesticides in standing crops until receding of rainfall. Make arrangements for draining out excess water from the field of Maize, Arhar, Groundnut and vegetables. Harvest the matured vegetable before the impending rain. SMS Advisory: Protect the vegetable seedlings in nursery from heavy rain by covering with plastic or polythene sheet over the nursery bed.

advisory: Weed Management: If pre-emergence herbicide has not been applied then apply Bispyribac sodium 10% SC (Nominee gold) @ 120ml/acre by mixing with 200 liters of water at 15-20 DAS or apply Fenoxaprop-p-ethyl 10% EC (Whipsuper) @240-260 ml/acre by mixing with 200 liters of water at 20-25 DAS in upland condition.
Nutrient Management: Apply 26 kg urea /acre after weeding in upland condition and 36 kg urea/acre after beushening in medium and low land condition as top dressing.

Land Preparation: Puddling should be done twice in 7-10 days interval in main field followed by land leveling for uniform crop stand. Incorporate dhaincha green manuring crop during initial puddling of main field. Incorporate well decomposed FYM @ 8 q/acre during the final land preparation.

Recommended dose of Fertilizer: Apply 26 kg DAP + 10 kg MOP + 10 kg ZnSO4 in upland condition and 35 kg DAP + 13 kg MOP + 10 kg ZnSO4 per acre in medium and low land condition as basal application. In boron deficient soil apply borax@2kg/ac during final land preparation.
